domain.name: Actor
domain.description: An actor or actress in the world, like Kate Winslet or Leonardo DiCaprio

text:
Low-wage workers are being forced to work to keep us fed, clothed, and healthy while the powerful safely stay home. 

Trump and his staff seem to get every COVID test they want. Those workers can’t, though.

Economic injustice rots in the heart of our coronavirus response.
